module.name: LResources
module.short: This unit maintains and stores all standard Lazarus resources in the global LazarusResources list and provides methods and types for component streaming.

descr.p: A Lazarus resource is streamed as an UTF-8 string, with a name, value and valuetype.
Lazarus resources are normally included via an include directive in the initialization part of a unit. To create such include files use the BinaryToLazarusResourceCode procedure.
To create an LRS file from an LFM file use the LFMtoLRSfile function which transforms the LFM text to binary format and stores it as Lazarus resource include file.

element.name: LRSComment
element.short: Text of the "automatically generated..." warning in resource files.

element.name: TLResource
element.short: The Lazarus resource descriptor class.

element.name: TLResource.Name
element.short: The resource name.

element.name: TLResource.ValueType
element.short: The resource type, always uppercase.

element.name: TLResource.Value
element.short: The resource value.

element.name: TLResourceList
element.short: The container class for all Lazarus resources.

element.name: TLResourceList.FList
element.short: Main list with all resource pointers.

element.name: TLResourceList.FMergeList
element.short: List needed for mergesort.

element.name: TLResourceList.FSortedCount
element.short: 0 .. FSortedCount-1 resources are sorted

element.name: TLResourceList.FindPosition
element.short: Returns the index of the named resource, -1 if not found.
element.descr: The list is sorted, if required.

element.name: TLResourceList.Sort
element.short: Sorts the list by resource name.

element.name: TLResourceList.MergeSort
element.short: MergeSort sorting part.

element.name: TLResourceList.Merge
element.short: MergeSort merge part.

element.name: TLResourceList.Add
element.short: Adds a resource.

element.name: TLResourceList.Add.Value
element.short: A sinlge value string.

element.name: TLResourceList.Add.Values
element.short: The value splitted into an string array.

element.name: TLResourceList.Find
element.short: Returns the resource of the given name (and type).

element.name: TLResourceList.Find.ValueType
element.short: Should be uppercase, if present.

element.name: TLResourceList.Count
element.short: The number of listed resources.

element.name: TLResourceList.Items
element.short: Indexed access to the resource list.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream
element.short: Helper class for streaming resources (read only).

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.FPRes
element.short: Resource in FPC format.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Initialize
element.short: Initializes the resource descriptor.
element.errors: EResNotFound if the resource does not yet exist.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Initialize.Name
element.short: The resource name.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Initialize.ResType
element.short: The resource type, can be Nil.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Create
element.short: Creates an resource stream for a named resource.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Create.ResName
element.short: The resource name.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Create.ResType
element.short: The resource type, can be Nil.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.CreateFromID
element.short: Creates an resource stream for a resource ID.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.CreateFromID.ResID
element.short: The resource ID.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.CreateFromID.ResType
element.short: The resource type.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.CreateFromHandle
element.short: Creates an resource stream from an resource descriptor.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Write
element.short: Raises an error on an attempt to write to the stream.
element.descr: The stream data must be provided by the implemented constructors and methods.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Res
element.short: The resource descriptor, owned by the global resource list.

element.name: TAbstractTranslator
element.short: Abstract base class for translators

element.name: TAbstractTranslator.TranslateStringProperty
element.short: The base class for an TReader.OnReadStringProperty handler.

element.name: LRSTranslator
element.short: The default translator instance to use in .

element.name: TLRSItemType
element.short: Stack item type for the nested resource reader/writer.

element.name: TLRSItemType.lrsitCollection
element.short: A list terminated by an EndList.

element.name: TLRSItemType.lrsitComponent
element.short: A component has two lists: properties and children.

element.name: TLRSItemType.lrsitList
element.short: A list with a known (stored) number of entries.

element.name: TLRSORStackItem
element.short: Stack item for the nested resource reader.

element.name: TLRSORStackItem.PushCount
element.short: The number of contained collections, needing an EndList.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader
element.short: Reader for resource streams.
element.descr: Uses an stack for reading nested objects.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FBuffer
element.short: The input stream buffer.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FBufSize
element.short: Size of the input buffer.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FBufPos
element.short: Current position in the input buffer.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FBufEnd
element.short: The number of bytes in the buffer.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FStack
element.short: The object stack.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FStackCapacity
element.short: The Length of the allocated stack.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.SkipProperty
element.short: Skip the property name, then the property value.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.SkipSetBody
element.short: Skips until the next empty string.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Push
element.short: Push a new resource item.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Push.Root
element.short: The Component whose properties follow.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Push.PushCount
element.short: The number of contained lists, which need an EndList.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Pop
element.short: Pop an item, or decrement its PushCount.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ClearStack
element.short: Destroys the stack, during reader destrucion.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.InternalReadValue
element.short: Reads the 1-byte value type.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.EndPropertyIfOpen
element.short: Terminate reading a Component list (properties or children).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadIntegerContent
element.short: Reads an 4 byte integer value.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Create.AStream
element.short: The input stream.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Create.BufSize
element.short: The stream buffer size to allocate.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.NextValue
element.short: Peek the next byte (value type indicator).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadValue
element.short: Reads the next ValueType. Pops or pushes a stack item if required (for list or collection).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.BeginRootComponent
element.short: Reads the filer signature from the input.
element.errors: EReadError 'Invalid Filer Signature' on filer signature mismatch.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.GetStackPath
element.short: Returns the qualified current item name.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Read
element.short: Read a number of bytes from the input stream.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadBinary
element.short: Reads binary data, stored with a Length prefix.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadFloat
element.short: Reads an Extended value (10 Bytes).
element.descr: The result may have less bytes, when Extended is not a 10 byte value.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadSingle
element.short: Reads an Single value (4 bytes).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadCurrency
element.short: Reads an Currency value (8 bytes).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadDate
element.short: Reads an Date value (8 bytes).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadIdent
element.short: Reads an identifier, maybe a name or a standard key (which is not stored).
element.errors: GDB error on an unexpected ValueType.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadIdent.ValueType
element.short: The expected type: vaIdent for an stored name, or vaNil, vaFalse, vaTrue, vaNull for an standard string.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadSet
element.short: Reads enum member names, until an empty string is read.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadSet.Result
element.short: The constructed set, as an Integer.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadSet.EnumType
element.short: The expected set type.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadStr
element.short: Reads an ShortString.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.SkipComponent
element.short: Skips an entire Component.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.SkipComponent.SkipComponentInfos
element.short: If True: skip prefix, component class name and component object name.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.SkipValue
element.short: Skips the next value.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Stream
element.short: The input stream.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Reader
element.short: The root component reader

element.name: TLRSOWStackItemState
element.short: Tracking what already has been stored or written.

element.name: TLRSOWStackItemState.lrsowsisStarted
element.short: now writing header

element.name: TLRSOWStackItemState.lrsowsisHeaderWritten
element.short: header saved on stack, not yet written to stream, waiting for data

element.name: TLRSOWStackItemState.lrsowsisDataWritten
element.short: header written to stream, data written

element.name: TLRSOWStackItem
element.short: Stack item for the nested resource writer.

element.name: TLRSOWStackItem.PushCount
element.short: waiting for this number of Pops

element.name: TLRSOWStackItem.ItemNr
element.short: Index in a collection or list.

element.name: TLRSObjectWriter
element.short: Object writer for Lazarus Resource Streams.
element.descr: The TLRSObjectWriter can find empty entries and omit writing them to stream.

element.name: TLRSObjectWriter.WriteWordsReversed
element.short: Writes multiples words (WideChar) with reversed byte order.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.Sort
element.short: Sort the items by LFM or LRS position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.Sort.LFMPositions
element.short: True for sorting by LFM position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOf
element.short: Searches for an item by LFM or LRS position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOf.LFMPositions
element.short: True for searching an LFM position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOfRange
element.short: Find a random item within an position range.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOfRange.FromPos
element.short: First acceptable position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOfRange.ToPos
element.short: First position after the range (exclude)

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOfRange.LFMPositions
element.short: True for searching LFM positions.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.SetPosition
element.short: Change the position of an item within the given position range.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.SetPosition.FromPos
element.short: First acceptable position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.SetPosition.ToPos
element.short: First position after the range (exclude)

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.SetPosition.MappedPos
element.short: The new position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.SetPosition.LFMtoLRSPositions
element.short: True for using LFM positions.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.LFM
element.short: Indexed access to the LFM positions.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.LRS
element.short: Indexed access to the LRS positions.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.Data
element.short: Indexed access to the Data pointers.

element.name: TUTF8Parser
element.short: Parser for identifiers, and string and number literals.

descr.p: Use to get the next token. The token type also is available in Token.
Allowed whitespace is newline (CR,LF), tab and space.
Allowed identifiers consist of ASCII letters, digits or underscore.
Strings are a sequence of quoted strings or #nn characters.
Numbers are parsed as integer or floating point values, with toFloat values subdivided into number, single, date or currency, according to FloatType.
All other characters are returned literally.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fStream
element.short: The input stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fBuf
element.short: The allocated buffer.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fBufLen
element.short: Number of valid chars (bytes) in the buffer.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fPos
element.short: Current position (index) in the buffer.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fLineStart
element.short: Buffer-relative begin of the current line.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fEofReached
element.short: True when reached the end of the input stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fLastTokenStr
element.short: Holds the last parsed token text

element.name: TUTF8Parser.GetTokenName
element.short: The name of a token, maybe the Token character itself.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.LoadBuffer
element.short: Fills the buffer from the input stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.CheckLoadBuffer
element.short: Skips to the next non-null character

element.name: TUTF8Parser.ProcessChar
element.short: Add the current character to the token string.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.IsNumber
element.short: True when the current character is a digit.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.IsHexNum
element.short: True when the current character is a hex digit.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.IsAlpha
element.short: True when the current character is an ASCII character (or underscore).
element.descr: Should mean: all allowed characters in an identifier. [To be updated for Unicode identifiers]

element.name: TUTF8Parser.IsAlphaNum
element.short: True when the current character is a digit or IsAlpha.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.GetHexValue
element.short: Returns the value of a hex digit.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.GetAlphaNum
element.short: Parses and returns an identifier.
element.errors: EParserError when the current character is not valid for an identifier.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleNewLine
element.short: Skip CR/LF, adjust SourceLine.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.SkipSpaces
element.short: Skip space and tab chars.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.SkipWhitespace
element.short: Skip all whitespace characters.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleEof
element.short: Marks end of input reached (fEofReached).

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleAlphaNum
element.short: Parse an identifier.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleNumber
element.short: Parse a number, recognizing trailing floating point format specifiers.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleHexNumber
element.short: Parse a hex number, prefix the token string with '$'.
element.errors: EParserError when no valid hex digit was found.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleQuotedString
element.short: Parse an quoted string, excluding the leading and trailing quotes.
element.errors: EParserError on an unterminated string literal.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleDecimalString
element.short: Parse an decimal Unicode codepoint, return it as an UTF-8 string.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleDecimalString.ascii
element.short: Is set to False on a non-ASCII character.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleString
element.short: Parses a string literal.

descr.p: The string can consist of quoted strings and Unicode codepoints. Surrounding quote characters are removed.
The result is stored in fLastTokenStr, in UTF-8 encoding.
The resulting token is toString for all-ASCII strings, else toWString.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleMinus
element.short: Tries to parse a negative number, or a single '-' character.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleUnknown
element.short: Sets Token to the unrecognized character (no error).

element.name: TUTF8Parser.CheckToken
element.short: Asserts that Token is of the expected type.
element.errors: EParserError when Token doesn't match the expected type.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.CheckToken.T
element.short: The expected token type.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.CheckTokenSymbol
element.short: Asserts that the given name was parsed (case insensitive).
element.errors: EParserError when Token doesn't match the expected type or name.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.CheckTokenSymbol.S
element.short: The expected identifier.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.Error
element.short: Raises an EParserError with the given message.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.Error.Ident
element.short: The message text.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.ErrorFmt
element.short: Raises an EParserError with the formatted message.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.ErrorFmt.Ident
element.short: The Format string.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.ErrorFmt.Args
element.short: The arguments to be formatted.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.ErrorStr
element.short: Raises an EParserError with the given message, adding source position information.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HexToBinary
element.short: Writes an hex value into the output stream.

descr.p: The hex digits must occur in pairs, for every byte.
The binary bytes are written in input order (highest first).

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HexToBinary.Stream
element.short: The output stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.NextToken
element.short: Parses the next token.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.NextToken.Result
element.short: The token type.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.SourcePos
element.short: Returns the current position in the input stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenComponentIdent
element.short: Parses an (possibly) qualified identifer, after a symbol has been parsed.
element.errors: EParserError when Token is not toSymbol.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenFloat
element.short: Returns the binary value of a floating point number.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenInt
element.short: Returns the binary value of an integral number.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenString
element.short: Returns the last parsed token as an string.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenSymbolIs
element.short: Compares the parsed symbol with the given string (case-insensitive).

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenSymbolIs.Result
element.short: True when a matching symbol has been parsed.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.FloatType
element.short: The type of the parsed floating point number. (number, date...)

element.name: TUTF8Parser.SourceLine
element.short: The current line number in the input stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.SourceColumn
element.short: The current column number in the source line.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.Token
element.short: The last parsed token type.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue
element.short: A queue to stream components, used for multithreading or network.

descr.p: The function ConvertComponentAsString converts a component to binary format with a leading size information (using WriteLRSInt64MB).
When streaming components over network, they will arrive in chunks.
TCustomLazComponentQueue tells you, if a whole component has arrived.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.ConvertComponentAsString
element.short: Converts a component to binary format with a leading size information (using WriteLRSInt64MB).

element.name: TPropertyToSkip
element.short: Item of TPropertiesToSkip

element.name: LazarusResources
element.short: The list of all loaded standard resources.

element.name: BinaryToLazarusResourceCode
element.descr: FPC is not optimized for building a constant string out of thousands of lines. It needs huge amounts of memory and becomes very slow. Therefore big files are split into several strings.

element.name: WriteLRSInt64MB
element.short: Writes an integer value, using the smallest possible representation.

element.name: Register
element.short: Registers the component TLazComponentQueue.

element.name: ReadError
element.short: Raises an EReadError exception.

element.name: PropValueError
element.short: Raises an InvalidPropertyValue EReadError.
